title: How to apply for a Jio broadband connection in Mumbai - Quora

response.answer_text: There are various ways through which one can apply for a Jio broadband connection Mumbai. One of the way though which I got my connections is: Visit the Jio official website to register for the Jio Fiber connection. You have to submit your details like address, name and mobile number. After registration through mobile OTP, a Jio executive will visit your place to verify all information. And then you can get you own Jio Fiber broadband connection in Mumbai.
Contact Jio Center in your area for getting a JioFiber High Speed Broadband connection. JioFiber is already available in many parts of Mumbai and Navi Mumbai.
